comment.author: 50763379@N08
comment._content:
Sorry, this is NOT a CV-580 i it isn't even a Convair. Although I admit it looks a bit like one it is in fact an Avro/bae-748. If you look very carefully you'll see the engines are different and the fuselage is a bit too fat and short for a Convair. 

Commuterman1
